Name: MoveFingersMMU
Author: Felix Gaisbauer
LongDescription: MMU allows to manipulate the finger joints by means of motion blending.
ShortDescription: MMU allows to manipulate the finger joints by means of motion blending.

Parameters.Name: Release
Parameters.Description: Specifies whether the hand posture should be released.

Parameters.Name: Duration
Parameters.Description: The desired duration until the pose is established.

Parameters.Name: AngularVelocity
Parameters.Description: The max angular velocity of the finger motions.
